alert.note: Alert for Upper Koyukuk Valley (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Fire Weather Watch issued June 30 at 2:43AM AKDT until July 03 at 12:00AM AKDT by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...FIRE WEATHER WATCH NOW IN EFFECT FROM FRIDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH SATURDAY EVENING FOR LIGHTNING FOR UPPER KOYUKUK VALLEY... * AFFECTED AREA...Upper Koyukuk Valley * TIMING...Noon Friday through Late Saturday Evening. Thunderstorms will occur during the PM timeframe. * LIGHTNING ACTIVITY LEVEL...4. * WINDS...Southeast 5 to 10 mph. * HUMIDITY...As low as 24 percent. * TEMPERATURES...74 to 84. * IMPACTS...Ample lightning from high based thunderstorms could lead to numerous new fire starts.
info.instruction: A Fire Weather Watch means that weather conditions could lead to the potential for a Red Flag event in the near future. This watch will remain in effect until it is upgraded to a Red Flag Warning or that it is determined that the Red Flag event will not develop. Please advise the appropriate officials or fire crews in the field of this Fire Weather Watch.
